title: Pall Bearers and Pepperoni
description: Just when you think you’ve hit bottom…A body shows up.Newly jobless and recently dumped by her fiancé, Eleanora Pacelli moves back to her childhood hometown to take care of her grandmother after her grandfather’s unexpected death.What was supposed to be a temporary stay becomes permanent when Ellie takes over operations at her grandparents’ old pizzeria. Desperately needing a new focus to turn her life around, she’s determined to bring the worn and tattered old restaurant back to its former successful state while pulling herself together.Things are going well until a body is found outside the pizzeria, under very suspicious circumstances. Ellie has to work against the clock to find out who the killer is in order to keep from losing everything that she’s worked so hard to rebuild…including her future.Will she save the day and set a new course?Find out in this delectable Cozy Mystery!
author: Patti Benning
